title: Dead.Rising.2.Duology.Repack-R.G.Mechanics

Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 Ghz / AMD Athlon X2 2.2 Ghz
Memory: 2 GB
Video Card: Nvidia GeForce 8800GTS / ATI Radeon HD 3850
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX Ã‚Â® 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 11 GB

Game information:

City of Fortuna, the capital of entertainment, filled
the walking dead. From now on, every citizen of this
vast metropolis - Party bloody reality show and has
to fight for itself. Someone do it better, someone - is worse.

The protagonist of the game - Chuck Green, a former world
champion motocross. He - one of those who are willing to
fight to the last, despite the difficulties and the overwhelming
numerical superiority of the enemy. During the terrible events
in Vegas, Chuck lost his beloved wife and his daughter Katie
was bitten. Save the girl from the zombie, he must do everything
in his power to give her a daily dose "Zombreks." In addition,
Chuck leads an investigation to ascertain the reasons which
provoked the invasion of zombies on the Fortune.


Dead Rising 2: Off the Record





Release Info:


Year: 2011
Genre: Action / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer: Capcom Games Vancouver
Publisher: Capcom
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language: Eng |Rus
Voice Language: Eng |Rus
Crack: enclosing (Xliveless)





System Requirements:

Operating System: Microsoft Windows XP/Vista/7
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon X2 processor
with a clock frequency of 2.2 GHz or better
Memory: 1 GB (XP) / 2 GB (Vista / 7)
Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce 8800GTS/ATI Radeon HD 3850 or better
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX Ã‚Â® 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 8.5 GB

Game information:

What happens if you send Frank West - Hero Dead Rising -
a city of Fortuna, the scene of the second part of the
renowned action? Continuation of the series will answer
this burning question. Forget everything you know about
Dead Rising 2 - Frank is back and Fortune with his
appearance will change once and for all!

In Off the Record for the company with the brave
photojournalist you come up with new kinds of zombies.
You have to set their own hands to design devices for
the destruction of the living dead, to understand the
intricacies of the plot and explore areas of Fortune,
in which Chuck Greene was not able to attend. You will
"Uranus Zone" - a theme park. Extensive area, decorated
in the sci-fi style and built up quite insane rides, is
an ideal platform for the destruction of zombies.

And, of course, do not forget the camera correct Frank.
Successful shots depending on the degree of severity,
drama and even eroticism ... will be awarded extra
points to prestige.

Repack Features:

Dead Rising 2

Do not recoded
Cut rolls Mode Terror is Reality
(because it is not available on the pirates)
Includes update 2

Dead Rising 2: Off the Record

Do not cut / no recoded
Includes update 1
